sim_pattern_non_uni = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=100.0,
    regions=[(1, 5, 1, 4), (0, 5, 4, 5)], row_slope=-0.01)
image = sim_pattern_non_uni.simulate_ci_pre_cti(shape=(5, 5))
image = np.round(image, 1)
assert (image == np.array([[0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 100.0], [0.0, 100.0, 100.0,
    100.0, 99.3], [0.0, 99.3, 99.3, 99.3, 98.9], [0.0, 98.9, 98.9, 98.9, 
    98.6], [0.0, 98.6, 98.6, 98.6, 98.4]])).all()
